remarks: Collect the odd terms in a sequence.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2015.)
statement:
iserodd.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN0 ) -> C e. CC ) $.
iserodd.h $e |- ( n = ( ( 2 x. k ) + 1 ) -> B = C ) $.
iserodd $p |- ( ph -> ( seq 0 ( + , ( k e. NN0 |-> C ) ) ~~> A <-> seq 1 ( + , ( n e. NN |-> if ( 2 || n , 0 , B ) ) ) ~~> A ) ) $.
$d B k $.
$d C n $.
$d k n ph $.
